Coronaviruses belong to the family Coronaviridae order Nidovirales. Two subfamilies make up the Coronaviridae family: Letovirinae and Orthocoronavirinae. Orthocoronavirinae has 4 genera: Alphacoronavirus, Betacoronavirus, Gammacoronavirus, and Deltacoronavirus. Coronaviruses that infect mammals belong to the Alphacoronavirus and Betacoronavirus genera
